name: SlowDown (parokis)
description:
In this Tic-80 game, you are Jin, an orange character who has to get to Lou, a blue character who falls through walls. You have to get to Lou because your speed runs out ,

controls:

left and right arrow keys to move jin left and right, z or up arrow key to jump, q to quit.

use c to go into cheat mode.

This game might not be too good because i didn't have a lot of time.

join my discord: https://discord.gg/HrZWZ5
